metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8952 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The mbcache feature in the ext2 and ext4 filesystem implementations in theLinux kernel before 4.6 mishandles xattr block caching, which allows localusers to cause a denial of service (soft lockup) via filesystem operationsin environments that use many attributes, as demonstrated by Ceph andSamba.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8952` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-116-generic - 4.4.0-116.140~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-116-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-116.140~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-116-lowlatency - 4.4.0-116.140~14.04.1
